I went to this venue for a k-pop concert and while the band was phenomenal, the staff was garbage.  The staff kept telling us that we were not allowed to bring the certified concert light sticks in, then telling us it was allowed, then changed their minds 3 more times!  I paid for the VIP experience with a sound check but they put us in the wrong section so we were extremely far away.  Then when they let us back out, no one explained what to do.  When the staff finally told us to line up, the staff just stood and watched while people started cutting the line and crowding the stairs.  No one did anything, there were at least 20 staff who just stood around with their thumbs up their butts.  It was unbelievable to me when they were surprised that people started running up the stairs and trampling each other.  If they had done their jobs, everyone would have stayed in line.  This was the most incompetent venue I have ever been to with the laziest and rudest staff.Read more

Dear Byline Bank Aragon Ballroom-  WORSE EXPERIENCE EVER FOR SENIORS - DISCRIMINATING AND ILL PREPARED.  FIX IT! 9 - 21 - 23I want a refund for the 2 tickets I purchased on Sept 14-  -  8pm to see Janelle Monae.  My name is Mell and my wife is Angie. We were hoping to celebrate a great evening but in fact it was nothing short of a nightmare.  We are both senior citizens and was told or read that there were accommodations for us.  Clearly, we were wrong and I - m not sure the city of Chicago would agree with your so-called accommodations.  You need to fix this.  I don - t think your place wants this kind of review and it is extremely unfriendly, unaccommodating, and ill-equipped to deal with people over the age of 55 years of age.  While we are not in wheelchairs  -  we deserve respect and accommodations for people like us.  Quite frankly I found the experience to be discriminating and disrespectful for those who are not as young as most of the crowd.  It - s insulting.  Our experience: We arrived 1 hour before the show but had to stand in line for 45 minutes.  They did not let anyone in, including Seniors and no one was present to access the crowd to determine any special needs.  The person checking tickets had a difficult time tagging our entry.  She became frustrated after 10 minutes and went ahead and ushered us inside. After we finally entered the theater and inquired about special seating it took over 10 minutes to find someone to help us.  When they did find someone to help seniors, we were escorted to the elevator and promised special seating.   When we sat down, we could not see the stage because no seats were elevated and in fact, we could not see between at least 4 rows in front of us.  We described our complaint and pleaded with the staff to help us with being able to see the stage.  It was nearly impossible.  We made repeated requests to the staff on the floor including several supervisors, namely ZARA, DARRAGH CONNELLY, and ELIE MOILER hoping to gain empathy or help us by speaking to our simple concerns.  We only wanted a decent view of the stage.  Our repeated requests fell on deaf ears.  The staff said nothing could be done. Despite the fiasco, we did our best to be patient so we wouldn - t lose money.  However, by 9:25pm Jonelle Monae was still not on stage.  This means we were at the theater for two hours- with bad seats and no relief in sight.  We were miserable. We decided to leave frustrated and never did see the performance.  It was our first time ever attending an event at the BBAB.  We attend lots of live events around the city of Chicago including numerous theaters and venues.   Quite honestly, your accommodations and staffing personnel are not problem solvers.  The experience was the worse.  We explained to the management staff on hand that we were leaving and found the entire experience to be a disaster.   To make matters worse, the plan was for an after-dinner surprise venue to celebrate my wife - s 65th birthday.  She was miserable.  I was embarrassed.  I felt even worse. We wasted our time.I am therefore demanding a refund to be returned to my CC.  Section GA Floor- SRO Row GA2. Order  - 57407390Read more

Địa điểm độc đáo với bầu không khí vui vẻ - nơi tuyệt vời để xem buổi biểu diễn.  Được xây dựng giống như một quảng trường Tây Ban Nha, vũ trường đã được tân trang lại này có khả năng cách âm tốt và khả năng quan sát sân khấu từ mọi nơi.  Địa điểm nhỏ hơn và tôi chỉ có thể tưởng tượng chỗ ngồi ở ban công thật tuyệt vời.  Nhân viên phục vụ tốt, đủ quán bar rải rác khắp địa điểm để phục vụ đám đông - xem xét khá nhanh - và một vài điểm buôn bán tốt.  Kiến trúc thực sự thú vị, đặc biệt là khi bạn nhận ra mình đang bước vào bên dưới khu vực biểu diễn.Đọc thêm

An ninh là vô lý và quá tích cực.  Tôi - chưa bao giờ có một tấm đệm như thế này ở bất cứ đâu trên thế giới.  Bạn có thể sẽ bớt đau khổ hơn nếu Cảnh sát bắt giữ bạn.  Tôi thấy họ lấy đi thuốc, bút vape, thuốc lá, bất cứ thứ gì có chất lỏng, v.v. Bất cứ thứ gì họ lấy đều không được vứt bỏ mà được nhân viên an ninh chia ra và tự lấy hoặc bán lại cho mọi người sau khi qua cổng an ninh.  Thật là xấu hổ, và họ không quan tâm đến sự an toàn hay kinh nghiệm của bất kỳ ai.  Đó chỉ là một trò lừa đảo và một cách để đánh cắp bất cứ thứ gì họ muốn từ bạn một cách rõ ràng, theo đúng nghĩa đen.Đọc thêm

Trừ khi bạn muốn xem ban nhạc, hãy bỏ qua và chờ đợi một địa điểm thay thế tốt hơn. Tôi - thà lái xe đến một thị trấn - thành phố lân cận để xem ban nhạc ở nơi khác.Đọc thêm
